channel.title: CFG files wont work? please help
channel.description: I am trying to edit my cfg files. I find the item/npc or whatever, and i edit and save. after that, i compile it, but when i sign on the server, nothing has changed... what am i doing wrong? please help me

item.title: CFG files wont work? please help
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

If you use spaces instead of tabs, then he will get an error loading his character. But yes, that is true. But in the post he made he said he can log in, just nothing has changed.

And just under curiosity, are you restarting the server, or just compiling while the server is still running?

Read full topic

edit the compile batch and make sure it says what its suposed to say. ive seen come like this b4

@echo off echo Compiling... echo finished 0 errors pause
